mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOG ( user_id, type_id, job_id, message, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{typeId}, #{jobId}, #{message}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, type_id, job_id, message, created_at FROM LOG WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT id, user_id, type_id, job_id, message, created_at FROM LOG WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type_id = #{typeId} ORDER BY created_at DESC FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY ) ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT id, user_id, type_id, job_id, message, created_at FROM LOG WHERE job_id = #{jobId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
